channel.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces
channel.description: I started on a 317 deobfuscated client and I was adding some stuff such as the new sideicons, the chat buttons, the new magic icons, and some transparent stuff like the chatbox, map and some sprites. But, when I'm done with that, I load the client and I go to "Unpacking Interfaces" and it just freezes there. At first I got an error where I had to increase my Java heap size and I did, but now it just freezes. Anybody know how to fix this?

item.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Steve734 Steve734
item.description:
@Steve734 wrote:

Your put too much in your cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Mmm, alright. Thanks. I’ll add like 3 things per run of client.

Read full topic

item.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Continue:

Wow, that’s going to take a while… Once I un-do everything and then isolate my problem, won’t the problem still persist because it’s still the same amount of things being taken into the cache? Or is it just that it’s too much for the cache to handle when you put everything in at once?

Well if its adding things into the cache, it might just take a while, but if its hard-loading or something is messed up it can take a while and/or freeze. If its actually freezing, and not taking 40-fer-evers, then you will need to isolate what is causing it

Read full topic

item.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces

item.title: Client freezes at Unpacking Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Continue:

I started on a 317 deobfuscated client and I was adding some stuff such as the new sideicons, the chat buttons, the new magic icons, and some transparent stuff like the chatbox, map and some sprites. But, when I’m done with that, I load the client and I go to “Unpacking Interfaces” and it just freezes there. At first I got an error where I had to increase my Java heap size and I did, but now it just freezes. Anybody know how to fix this?

Un-do everything you just did, and add it little at a time until you isolate the problem.

Read full topic
